alfredsnippet.snippet:
"[Reconciling gravity with the quantum principle] is unfinished business, but it is likely to involve jettisoning commonsense concepts of continuous time and three-dimensional space."

- Martin Rees, Our Cosmic Habitat (2001) p.147
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Martin Rees' Prediction on Reconciling Gravity with Quantum Mechanics
